sentences.sContent: More and more, health is the unwitting victim of policies made in the international systems that tie countries, economies, commerce, and trade together.
sentences.sContent_eng: More and more, health is the unwitting victim of policies made in the international systems that tie countries, economies, commerce, and trade together.
sentences.sCn: 在越来越多的情况中，卫生工作不知不觉地成为把国家、经济、商业和贸易联系在一起的国际系统中所制定政策的受害者。

sentences.sContent: But Kimberly-Clark, which touts its green credentials on its website, rejects the idea that it is pushing destructive products on an unwitting American public.
sentences.sContent_eng: But Kimberly-Clark, which touts its green credentials on its website, rejects the idea that it is pushing destructive products on an unwitting American public.
sentences.sCn: 但是金佰利，虽在其网站上宣称有环保证明，但拒绝承认它正在向不知情的美国公众推销其破坏环境的产品。

synos.tran: 不知情的；不知不觉的，无意的

remMethod.val: un(不) + witting(知道的， 有意的) → 无意的， 不知不觉的

words.tran: 不知不觉地；不知情地；不经意地
